name: nonagenarian
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who is between 90 and 99 years old

relating to a nonagenarian: He looks after the business affairs of his nonagenarian mother. The nonagenarian artist creates the kind of sculptures that inhabit our nightmares.
More examplesFewer examplesIt fills me with fury to see my nonagenarian grandmother outside her cottage, picking up litter.Nonagenarian women sip powerful coffees while their great-grandchildren play on the little beach.She fought for years to make sure she received some of the nonagenarian billionaire's fortune.
